name: Lorem Ipsum Post Generator
author: Jon Fox

sections.description: Lorem Ipsum Post Generator is a plugin to help quickly generate test posts and comments. You can specify a number of posts, a range of paragraphs per post, and a range of comments per post and the plugin will generate a sample set of posts and comments using Lorem Ipsum text. Great for quickly getting some test data or sample text to demonstrate a new theme or plugin.

short_description: Lorem Ipsum Post Generator allows you to generate posts and comments using Lorem Ipsum text.
